resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12497


   Template arithmetic kernel executors with the underlying physical type to increase code reuse, decrease binary size, decrease compilation times.

issuetype.description: A task that needs to be done.
issuetype.name: Task

fields.description: Some of our arithmetic kernel executors are templated on different logical types (e.g. duration or timestamp) even though they could use the underlying physical type.
